summary: A Los Angeles student working as a coroner's assistant falls in love with a strange young woman.
cast: David Naughton|Dorian Harewood|Marilyn Jones|Barbara Stock|Arthur Rosenberg|James Victor|Brad Dourif|Anne Bloom|Linda Lawrence|Adele Rosse|Marc Silver|James Oliver|Ann Blessing|John Bennick|Nigel Bullard|Cathy Cole|Timothy Stack|Stacy MacGregor|Gary McMillan|Holly McCarver|Liis Kailey|Laurel Rosenberg|James Veres|Herb Mitchell|Bruce Wright|Jason Ross-Azikiwe|Tom Willett
title: I, Desire
